text: @MarshaBlackburn Have you seen Tennessee’s COVID-19 numbers, Senator Blackburn? Thanks to you and your God, Trump, those numbers will go much higher. It is you that kowtows to a self-centered moron...Good luck as an analyst on Fox News.
